name: bron
text: I wonder if anybody suggested drawing on him...

name: jhaela
text: Dude you can't draw on GOD while he's passed out. You know he'd know it was you, and he'd get you back.

name: abe
text:
"And I sayeth unto you, whosoever it was that saw fit to adorn my countenance with this moustache must surely confess , lest they suffer mine eternal wrath."

-Sammichamiah 4:20

name: ktistecmachine
text: I've always felt this was missing. I'd love to see the rest of your Bible fan fiction.

name: bachamp
text: I wonder who's the guy who's dealin to god? I would like some of that stuff.

name: rasalghul
text: God grows his own weed, yo.  It's divine.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: 4 20... nice touch

name: seph
text:
Nice Pete would be green with envy.

Then he would stow your body in a van and declare himself the winner.

name: connormc
text:
Green with envy, eh?

I see what you did there.

name: mortshire
text: A comment left by mortshire was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Carpetbag, goocifer, woodenteeth, kickstart, cheeks_jd, girlandagun)

name: anomalous3
text: Can god order a sandwich so big that even he cannot eat it all?

name: dirtyantaeus
text: Yes, but he could still eat it.

name: alejandroadam
text: I can't stop laughing at this. this is a perfect statment about god.

name: heyman
text: as leftovers in the fridge over the next week or so

name: mattylite
text:
Hah Ha!
Ha Ha Ha
Haa Haa!
( not an original laugh )

name: mattylite
text: Shit, also not a faithful reproduction of the laugh it was supposed to be a faithful reproduction of.

name: ghostd
text: My mind has been blown!

name: evolume
text: He can order it but damned be if they will make it, even for God.

name: farqussus
text: "God? Hell no. He orders all this shit and answers the damn door! No subs for God!"

name: baryonyx
text: Some modern theologians postulate the universe is actually the remains of such a sandwich.

name: tekende
text: That must have been one nasty-ass sandwich.

name: baryonyx
text: The Rudest.

name: invidious
text:
Quote:
Can god order a sandwich so big that even he cannot eat it all?

Yes. That's why he had to create pot. Problem solved.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by crinklebat, crawfomp, lux, kledermans)

name: a_dude
text: very classic.

name: flim
text:
I wonder, if the herb is not his thing, if God HAS a thing?
I would very much like to know what God's thing is
That would be useful information

name: spectre
text: He likes to steal an occasional bottle of communion wine.

name: niggar
text: His thing is adenochrome

name: jackparsons
text: Oh definitely. "Fear And Loathing In Heaven".

name: tekende
text: His thing is saving our souls and loving everyone, I think. The problem is those times when He does toke...He tends to do stuff like flood the earth and gamble with Satan, that kind of thing.

name: killerlimpet
text: Not to mention the whole Creation thing. One of the things ID advocates don't mention is that if you actually Argue From "design" that occurs in the natural world, you usually wind up arguing for a designer like this god. Or Loki.

name: killerlimpet
text: OR WORSE.

name: tekende
text: what

name: tekende
text: Wh...why did I post this? That comment makes sense, what was wrong with me when I read it the first time?

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "in my vision God has tevis or birkenstocks"

name: thisdoggisproice
text: When God skates it is probably like the most electric Tony Hawk combo one could think of, he is the Carmen Sandiego of skateboarding, grinding the entire Louvre and such.

name: honesttom
text: I think Richard Dawkins would be furious to read this strip. Let's send it to him and see what happens.

name: dejavroom
text:
I love the THINK ABOUT IT TODD


Blister, where are ye now?

name: rowboat
text: I think I saw God on the Quad.

name: m-e-charm
text: This is definately one of my alltime favorites.

name: coco
text: I love that Todd is grasping his head when finds out, because his mind has been blown.

name: kamet
text: One of my absolute favorites. I use that line alot... "Think about it.. who's gonna yell at God?"

name: foetus_punch
text:
I am high, and everything is SO DELICIOUS.

Nightlife was right and I have received a sign.

name: xndrew
text: Blister's pose in the final panel put me out of my seat.

name: joeynarcotic
text: God this comic does undead religious squirrel stoner humour so well. I riot with glee.

name: belgand
text:
Hmm... so heaven is warm enough for Birkenstocks? Should I maybe pack some shorts or will I need a light jacket?

If heaven is anything like San Francisco people will start bitching if the temperature rises above 68 in the summer.
